product_name: REI Vitality Gym Duffel Bag - Women's
long_description: Roomy and well-organized, the women's REI Vitality Gym Duffel Bag is an ideal packing solution for your daily workouts. Vented "garage" compartment on one end separates shoes and damp gear from the bag's other contents. Large pocket on opposite end can hold a large water bottle, umbrella or hat and gloves. Zip pocket along one side includes fleece-lined slot pockets for stashing a phone, music player or small accessories. Adjustable padded shoulder strap and grab handles with wrap closure offer carrying options. The women's REI Vitality Gym Duffel Bag also has 1 zip inner pocket and 1 zip outer pocket to help you keep track of small essentials and help you keep everything organized.
short_description: Roomy and well-organized, the women's REI Vitality Gym Duffel Bag is an ideal packing solution for your daily workouts.
